description:
In this video I discuss how pharaoh (real name Lin Rui Siang) the administrator of Incognito Market who just 2 months ago, exit scammed and tried extorting the platforms users, is now in police custody and potentially facing life in prison.  I go over the OPSEC mistakes he made from using illegal BTC for personal use, to his miserable attempts to hide in plain sight.

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com

title: Worlds Dumbest Darknet Admin Gets Busted
